FAIL_TO_PASS: when "program help sub1" then sub1
when execArgv --inspect=0 then spawn execArgs --inspect=0
should call action when there are no implicit conflicting options set
when program has value/no flag specified with value then specified value
should allow default value with a conflicting option
should report correct error for positive option when negated is configured
when program has mandatory-yes/mandatory-no flag specified with flag then true
when execArgv empty then spawn execArgs empty
when specify unknown option with subcommand and action handler then error
should report correct error for negated option when positive is configured
when program has required value default then default value
when program sent SIGUSR1 then executableSubcommand sent signal too
when executableSubcommand succeeds then call exitOverride
when specify excess argument then throw CommanderError
when program has yes/no flag specified negated then false
when specify unknown option with subcommand argument and action handler then error
when program has required value specified then value as specified
should report correct error for positive env variable when negated is configured
should report correct error for negated option with preset when negated is configured
should report both env variables as sources, when configured option and conflicting option are set
